reviewText: This is fun for little ones.

I wish there were more Lamb Chop videos available! I grew up watching Lamb Chop's Play Along, and would love to share more of it with my son. This compilation is wonderful, it gives kids a lot of ideas for jokes and tricks that they can try on their family and friends - excellent for little ones just learning how to tell jokes! Shari Lewis is truly amazing.

And now my children watch it too, Lamb Chop is one of our favorite shows, very educational and entertaining, and SO funny!  In this particual one Shari Lewis teaches the children lots of tricks, and little Lamb Chop says their Knock-Knock jokes, its hillarious, a must have for Shari Lewis' fans.  My 10 year old niece learned the tricks which made her get interested in more advanced magic tricks and my children love to do the tricks too although they are still too young to get into some serious stuff, nevertheless, any child of any age will find this enjoyable, and I love to watch it with them. 5+ Stars
